text.p: Easdaq-listed French smart card maker ActivCard said on Wednesday it had entered into a technological alliance with the electronic commerce units of U.S. conglomerate Schlumberger Ltd.

"The spectrum of products made available by this agreement is expected to provide ready-to-use security tools to enable many emerging electronic commerce applications including home banking and shopping, secure e-mail and corporate communications over the Internet, corporate intranets and other telecommunication networks," ActivCard said in a statement.
Financial terms or details were not given.
